price: ߛߊ߲ ߣߌ߫ ߘߎ߱ ߡߊ߫ ߞߊ߬ߛߌ߫ ߏ߬ ߟߎ߫ ( ߡߊ߬ߤߌߣߊ ) ߡߊ߬߸ ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߘߏ߲߬ ߡߊ߫ ߡߊߞߐ߬ߣߐ߲߬ ߜߘߍ߫ ߞߍ߫
arabic: فَمَا بَكَتۡ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلسَّمَآءُ وَٱلۡأَرۡضُ وَمَا كَانُواْ مُنظَرِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: famā bakat ʿalayhimu al-samāu wal-arḍu wamā kānū munẓarīna
